name: Semma
description: As a newcomer wandering the foodscape of New York, stepping into Semma felt like crossing into a culinary sanctuary. The moment you're greeted with the scent of Dosas and Curries, you know this isn't just another stop on your map‚Äîit's a destination. What truly stands out? The reviews speak for themselves: 'Authentic South Indian dishes, celebrated dosas and curries.' This isn't just a repeated chorus‚Äîit's the lived experience of diners who've come before you, and one you're likely to echo after your first bite.
reviewSummary: Authentic South Indian dishes, celebrated dosas and curries.
